game.name: Crazy Hotel Together
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Crazy Hotel Together를 발견해 보세요! 이 게임에서는 당신과 친구들이 조금 독특한 호텔을 함께 운영해야 합니다. 손님들의 요청을 충족시키고 호텔을 업그레이드하여 저가 호텔을 웅장한 궁전으로 변신시키세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Discover Crazy Hotel Together, a hotel management game where you and your friends have to run a rather unusual hotel! Fulfill your guests’ requests and upgrade your establishment to transform it from a low-cost hotel into a palace!
